    @pytest.mark.dependency(depends=["step01_pkg_list"])
    def test_step02_check_2pa_icons_present_on_appdrawer(driver, adb):
        try:
            ensure_driver_alive(driver)
        except InvalidSessionIdException:
            driver = restart_driver(driver)
    
        try:
            driver.implicitly_wait(1)
        except Exception:
            pass
    
        time.sleep(5)
    
        history = []
    
        try:
            ensure_in_appdrawer(driver, timeout=30, force_all=True)
            debug_foreground(driver, " step02_entered")
    
            for i in range(1, SCROLL_TIMES + 1):
                ensure_in_appdrawer(driver, timeout=20, force_all=False)
                debug_foreground(driver, f" round{i}_before")
    
                present_before = [label for label in EXPECTED_2PA_LABELS if is_app_label_present(driver, label)]
                print(f"[Step02] Round {i} before arrow_down: present={present_before}")
                history.append((i, "before", present_before))
    
                try:
                    btn = WebDriverWait(driver, 3).until(
                        EC.element_to_be_clickable((AppiumBy.XPATH, ARROW_DOWN_XPATH))
                    )
                    btn.click()
                except Exception as e:
                    print(f"[Step02] Round {i}: arrow_down not clickable/found: {e}")
    
                time.sleep(WAIT_AFTER_CLICK_SEC)
    
                ensure_in_appdrawer(driver, timeout=10, force_all=False)
                debug_foreground(driver, f" round{i}_after")
    
                present_after = [label for label in EXPECTED_2PA_LABELS if is_app_label_present(driver, label)]
                print(f"[Step02] Round {i} after arrow_down: present={present_after}")
                history.append((i, "after", present_after))
    
            final_present = history[-1][2] if history else []
>           assert final_present, (
                "No 2PA icons found in AppDrawer.\n"
                f"EXPECTED_2PA_LABELS={EXPECTED_2PA_LABELS}\n"
                f"final_present={final_present}\n"
                f"history={history}"
            )
